name: Jumbo Queen Sized Forget The Filler Lip Plumper Line Smoothing Gloss
about: What it is: A clinically tested, ultra-shiny gloss with immediate and long-term softening, hydrating, and visibly plumping benefits...Highlighted Ingredients:.- MAXI-LIP™: Scientifically and clinically shown to visibly increase lip volume by 40 percent..- Shea Butter: Hydrates and soothes the lips..- Hyaluronic Acid: Makes lips feel pillowy soft...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This clean lip gloss feels wonderful to apply with a plush applicator that luxuriously hugs your lips. Immediately, lips feel comforted and appear ultra-shiny and smooth with less-visible lines and signs of irritation. With consistent use, this gloss is shown to visibly increase lip volume and decrease lines...The oversized doe has curves and then some. The size of the vial accommodates its plush size. When the doe is removed from the vial, it appears less full. The total amount of product in the vial is 3.3 mL as is written on the packaging, but the vial is big—just like the doe and just like your lips, when you use the product...Clinical Results:.Based on an independent study on the specific ingredient complex, MAXI-LIP™, it’s clinically proven to: - Improve lip condition +100% - Improve lip softness and comfort +70% - Improve lip hydration +60%...
ingredients: -Maxi-Lip: Supports lip collagen synthesis. .-Shea Butter: Hydrating..-Hyaluronic Acid..Polybutene, Polyglyceryl-2 Tetraisostearate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Methylstyrene/Indene Copolymer, Synthetic Beeswax, Isostearyl Isostearate, Stearalkonium Bentonite, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Glycerin, Water, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Octyldodecanol, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Menthoxypropanediol, Capsicum Frutescens Fruit Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Flavor, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Nicotinate, Tribehenin, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Rosa Canina Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Sorbitan Isostearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Phenoxyethanol, Lactic Acid. May contain: iron oxides (ci 77492), titanium dioxide (ci 77891), red 30 lake (ci 73360)....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to clean lips and wear solo as a nearly clear, ultra-shiny gloss. .-Apply on top of lipstick to add glass-like shine to your favorite shade (while getting the visible plumping benefits of the gloss). .-Apply before bed to benefit while you sleep.

shades.shade_descriptor: pink champagne with a pearl finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss caught my eye in Sephora and based on marketing I was tempted to try it. I ordered online and did pickup in store with the mini size at first. Imagine my surprise when I opened it and saw it was barely anything in it? I was like nahh (NYC Accent lol) let me go back and pay the difference to get the FULL SIZE! Imagine my disappointment AGAIN that the full size barely had any product it in it as well! I will say the color is pretty and I have full lips so it looked amazing on me. I probably won’t buy again only because for the price and the amount of product you get is not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product can stand on its own as far as color and shine. This product feels good on the mouth but I don’t think it hydrates the lips that well. I got this color thinking it would be more opaque but  it’s basically clear.

reviews.review_title: great but don’t like the packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i really love this product. it fills lip lines and looks beautiful. however, the package gets really messy and a lot of product is on the applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely gorgeous color and not sticky at all. Love that that it doesn’t burn your lips like other lip plumper. Lawless is my go to lipgloss
It’s nice! I really like the product but the thing is that is way to small how I imagine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great scent, color, and shine. It is a little sticky for about 5 minutes after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeee this gloss perfect color & last long ! Definitely am going to purchase more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lasts for a long time and is the perfect mild plumping. I usually hate lip glosses but I’ve repurchased over 10 times!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: gives a nice plumping effect but I don't see a difference in my lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for BIG LIP people because the wand is extra large.  The formula is cooling and soothing, a winter skin lifesaver for my lips 💋

reviews.review_title: Love product but new tube mostly empty
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this product, however my most recent purchase wasn’t even half-filled when I opened it. I was on a trip to NYC for the holidays and was running low and decided to stop in the Sephora in the meatpacking district since I don’t have a Sephora in my new home town. I was waiting for my flight to return home and opened the package and found very little product in the tube. Here I am unable to go back to Sephora as I am already at airport and I don’t have a store when I get home. It’s really too bad because I love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite lip products! Not sticky and beautiful finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful color. The consistency is amazing too. The only downside is I feel like there’s not much product in it. I use them up SO fast and I don’t use them THAT often

reviews.review_title: A must have for every make up bag!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is gorgeous & it stays on for a long time!!! My lips are on the drier side, this keeps them moisturized without having to reapply all the time. I will be buying other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product because I do like a sheet gloss and it looked like it would be really great; but when I swatched it in store vs wearing it when I bought it, there was no color pay off in the color cherry vanilla.  Not to mention the tube was not even full, it was practically a fourth gone with just one application.  It is not worth the price for the amount.  Sorry it’s a pass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipgloss ! It smooths your lips out like I’ve never seen something do before , there’s not much plumping I don’t think , just minimal amount. It lasts for awhile without having to reapply .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Felt thick and sticky...cheap. Not worth the $.... nothing special about this product at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a nice lip gloss with a good colour but it runs out fast for the price, and honestly it was hard to see a difference in the plumpness of my lips. Good lasting power though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not the best plumper but I love the way it looks and feels on my lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Reduces the appearance of lines on my lips! And makes my lips look a lot more plump!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OBSESSED. Buy it u won’t regret. Only thing is there’s not much in it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easily one of the best lip glosses out right now, I've repurchased this atleast 3 times already. The gloss it leaves on your lips makes them look juicy and alive, it's perfect for reapplying right before that picture, before you leave for date night, just buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite gloss! Slightly plumping with no burn and lasts forever. I love the applicator and the cherry vanilla color makes your lips look naturally gorgeous! I make all my friends try it and they love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very cool-toned, and this color looked a horrendous orange on me. Other than that, I love this formula, love the applicator, loved the flavor, and loved the big size of this. I am returning this only because of the color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is a beautiful lipgloss, but it’s not worse. $52! There are lots of $10 of glasses that would work just as well. I return mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this filler lip plumper smoothing gloss and I like the way it feels on my lips. Keeps them moist and not dried out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found while using this that it stayed on my lips for hours, which I loved. It doesnt give a super glossy look and almost dries down to adhere to the lip without getting sticky. Wears very nice throughout the day as well, every once and a while you can smack your lips and still feel a generous amount of it on and it stays silky and smooth. Almost like it clings to your lips. When applying it does feel thick however, which I got used to very quick but was hard to enjoy. I bought the cherry vanilla, and it has a very subtle scent, which was great because you dont smell it all day. Almost like a cherry bubblegum. After a few moments when you apply you can feel a slight cooling sensation on your lips that doesn't burn. It also has a different type of applicator which I thought I would love but it grabs way too much product for myself personally, and then everything gets messy when I try and put some back. The bottle didn't spill when I let it bounce around in my purse which is a plus but it also came half full due to the shape of the bottle and applicator (with the wand in the bottle it looks full, but when you remove it there is very little product in the bottle). I've also used this when my lips were cracked and it hasn't bothered my skin at all, but I wouldn't call it 'nourishing'. 0 colour payoff. All in all, it's a very basic and boring gloss and I'm not sure it's worth $34 but I also didn't hate it. If it was cheaper I think it would be a lot more worth it for what it is and does.

reviews.review_title: Empty product. Sad launch from lawless
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Came in looking so empty. For this price it should have more product… fix this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this lipgloss but incredibly disappointed by the lack of product for a $35 lipgloss. Brand new and it’s half empty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The cream Soda smell is nice, that’s about it. Doesn’t plump, too tacky for my preference. The applicator head is quite large you need to be careful putting on the gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok first off the product is nice but not for the price.. it didn’t plump me very much but was smoothing and is a thicker gloss withought being sticky. That being said when the applicator is taken out there’s only about half a tube left which for 40 dollars is crazy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE! It smells so good! Great color! Been a faithful Lawless Forget the Filler Lip Gloss since finding it over a year ago. Jumbo size is a fantastic idea…we could use a few “pocket” sized as well for when we don’t want to carry around more than our phones & an ID.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Truly disappointing. When the lid is removed the product is half empty. Not what you would expect for this price point. Would not recommend

reviews.review_title: A great addition to my gloss collection.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looked at a lot of lip plumper glosses and when I came across this product it seemed like the right fit. I like the effect of plumping it gives and subtle tint and is long lasting. One thing I don't like is the sticky feeling once it starts to wear off.

reviews.review_title: Lawless forget the filler.-Will not buy again.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Never again. So disappointed, just opened my package and the bottle is empty. The color is also No accurate as it shows translucent. Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a lip junkie, and this is high key my favorite lip gloss I’ve tired in a long time.  My advise before buying this product is to look at the amount of mls you are buying because the packaging is deceiving to how much product you are actually getting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the formula and the color is gorgeous!! However, the packaging sucks. The applicator is very nice but the container leaks all the time so a lot of product is lost and it’s just a mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, but I lost it the second day I bought it :(,￼ it didn’t settle into my fine lines and made my lips more plump

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me I tried at the store and I liked  But when I used at home for hours I didn’t like it  Unfortunately the box was in the trash and I couldn’t return it
hands down my favorite gloss! I love the feel the hydration and the plump!  glad I got a  mini in a sephora kit!  so I could go back and buy the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the color payoff and application of this gloss! So many friends ask to borrow it so I definitely need to buy a backup. Begging and praying Lawless makes this a permanent addition to their line!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Adore this product. It is a satisfying application and has a slight plumping sensation. The product color is stunning and smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great lip gloss but even with the top on it spills out from the top a little and it gets messy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cherry vanilla is my favorite glow off all time. It has a perfect amount of tint and feels INCREDIBLE on the lips. The only sad part is the giant applicator that takes up too much room and because of that, there’s barely any product. That’s sad because I am in love with this gloss

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. The only bad thing is that it does come with a lot of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: overpriced for a clear lipgloss, definitely nothing special

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for summer, a bit sticky but super hydrating!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best plumping gloss hands down! Wish there was more product, but you certainly get what you pay for. Best plumping affect. Not too sticky and not to tingly (does tingle though!).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pricey, limited product, mediocre plumping, glossy finish. 3 stars because I love the applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: best lippie out there! love the plum and the cherry vanilla color- first lip gloss i’ve ever repurchased:)
It’s a good product, but the quantity is sooooo less for the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: literally the best lip gloss i've tried. i bought this out on a limb and im so glad i did, i use it all the time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! I totally see how is worth the hype but there’s few amount of product for that price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love everything about these glosses . I have had several and will always repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really do enjoy the product itself  smells nice and application is beautiful and provides hydration. However, it seems like the product isn’t full like it’s empty and it doesn’t seem like it would’ve been used, so I think it’s just big packaging and less product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Every other “plumping” gloss I have tried has been extremely drying and uncomfortable to wear. This actually feels moisturizing. I just wish the glossy finish would last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product is beautiful this specific color for some reason is always empty. this is is my 2nd and I’m going to return again bc it’s an empty $26 tube. You can see the empty spaces in the bottle. Please fix lawless

reviews.review_buyer_description: Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color is nice i use it with brown lip liner. The plumping doesn’t really last long and also finishes too quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks sooooo pretty but it’s so expensive for no product. I’ve used it twice so far and it’s already almost empty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 100% worth it. I bought the mini and fell in love with it so I just had to buy the full size. It doesnt sting really bad its more like a tingly sensation. Its really really good. Its so nice paired with lip liner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a trip because I liked the name, and oh my GOSHHH its so good! It instantly makes your lips super soft, smoothing out all the lines on your lips, and it also plumps your lips with ZERO PAIN!! Its very cooling and feels very nice on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color daisy pink was comparable to a concealer lips color and not what the picture provided. Way too light and the pink hue was really off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it so much! Not too sticky and the perfect shade! Smell is wonderful. But it is a bit pricey for how much product there is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super disappointed with this. There’s barely in a product, super thick, and smells like old chapstick. The price does not match the quality of the product at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lasts longer than most glosses just wish there was more product in it for what you’re paying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beauties color in the watermelon. It’s not too tacky and does have a plumping/slightly tingly feel

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so muchhhh! But it does come half empty would I say it’s a must have no, but it is such a good lip gloss the applicator is so nice it is kinda curved so it fills ur lips nicely! I would definitely buy it again.

reviews.review_title: Super pretty shade and great lip product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product and the color is beautiful. I was unsure about the shade lavender but I love it. It’s not sticky and love the plumping feel

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to give this gloss a try after hearing everyone rave about it, but I truly don’t understand the hype. First, they don’t even fill it halfway! I couldn’t believe it and that’s because I purchased the jumbo! I expected more for almost $40. I like the finish of this gloss and the *very* slight tint with Cherry Vanilla, but it’s really nothing spectacular. It fills in lines really well.. but so do most thick glosses just like this one. I’ve seen the same performance from drugstore glosses. Save your buck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is so thick without being sticky. It doesn't matter what color you choose because they are all beautiful and pigmented to perfection. They last very well for a gloss and look great without liner on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the colour and it lasts a decent amount of time for a gloss, but it is fairly sticky. Although it’s listed as a plumper is doesn’t burn the lips like some other products I’ve tried which is a bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is sooo perfect! The color “George” specially is my favorite. It’s a beautiful chocolate brown color & glazes over your lips like a smooth glass! It doesn’t sink into fine lines & looks great in pictures as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this lip gloss. It gives a plump look and does not dry out on lips. Only complaint is that you have to constantly put it on, as it does not last on the lips long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Reviewers are right that the tube looks empty. Also not too impressed with the gloss fenty is much better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tried super hard to like this but it comes practically empty and doesn’t do much than any other gloss. It also made my lips itchy after wearing it so definitely going to return asap. Might work for you though,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good lip gloss the only bad thing is its expensive for how small it is it looks bigger on camera but its acc really smallll

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s okay…it doesn’t plump like I thought it would but it does give a tingly feel. Also the color is different in the bottle, when you swatch and on the lips. It’s confusing!
Just an average gloss. I noticed very minimal tingling and no apparent plumping. I’ve gotten way more plump out of a cheap ELF lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A new favorite! This is my new favorite lip plumper. I come from the days where the only option were ones that felt like your lips were endlessly burning. This is SO much better than that. It provides a true, visual plump AND an enjoyable user experience. It feels great on my lips and makes me feel so pretty. Obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formula, the color, and the cooling feeling it gives !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love the applicator and the shade that i bought (cherub). it plumps decently without feeling uncomfortable. the color i chose also happens to be very pretty on its own and looks great on top of many different lipsticks. only thing is that it doesnt last that long, and for a gloss that costs 50$ i expected more on that side. but still a great product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is probably one of the best gloss I've ever tried but even the jumbo size is literally as expensive or more than the Dior lipgloss per ml, the smaller one is way more soo if you want to splurge I'd say splurge on something else

reviews.review_title: Bad consistency/ doesn’t fill in lines of lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this because a girl raved about it on tik tok and said it filled the lines of ur lip but it didn’t do that for me at all, in-fact it emphasized the lines on my lips even more? The color is not cute and the consistency of the lip gloss is weird, the color seperately from the gloss if that makes sense and I have to keep smoothing it over with my finger. Not worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is comfortable and gorgeous. it doesn't do any extreme plumping, but it has a slight minty sensation, and the thickness and shine do make your lips look more plump. It also makes my lips feel nourished, which is a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gloss is amazing but the fact it’s not even filled, you’ll run out of the product fast. I haven’t even been constantly using it and I’ve had this product no more than a week. You’ll run through it quick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very comfortable on the lips and lasts longer than I expected about 3hrs. Very glossy and smooths the lines on lips. Love the color. Didn’t notice any plumping tho.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color on my lips, super cute red / pink !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m still deciding if i really like this product. It definitely has the pink sheer, but no so plumping

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lip gloss currently! I'll be purchasing other colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING!!!! This gloss is everything. It left my lips so smooth and glossy. It’s not sticky at all, but I will say it does little to no plump. I would recommend this product it’s amazingggg!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product.  Wonderful color, plumping and shine.  I go through it quickly is the only downfall.

reviews.review_title: GREAT GLOSS BUT NOT A RE-PURCHASE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking for a plumper…this is not it but I’m not for a plumper I don’t like them so lucky me. However, my issue is that the bottle is empty and so are the jumbo. great product but their cheapness will. be their downfall

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lipgloss hands down, it’s beautiful… my go to for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells AMAZING, like I want to eat it lol. It is also such a pretty cool toned Barbie pink color that you can put on sheer or build up the color, not patchy. It’s my favorite at the moment for every day!

LOVE this gloss. I use this alone in the morning to look fresh or over lipstick for a glassy shine. It is thicker but lasts well. The plumping effect is great. The mini size is super cute and is great for keeping in my belt bag

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is on the sticky side and has a very strong scent which I didn’t enjoy. It doesn’t smooth the lines on my lips and looks like any other gloss. I will be returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am forever and always a lipgloss girlie and when I say this is the best plumping lipgloss I have ever tried, it means something. Doesn’t feel “minty” and is the perfect thickness without being sticky. Obsessed is an understatement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought I was confused when my daisy pink shade ran out, but I was right! This product is unfortunately extremely deceiving. It’s a good gloss but you won’t get more than 10/15 uses

reviews.review_title: Does what it says it will do!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The lip gloss is a beautiful color and fills in the lines on my lips perfectly. I was happy with the result

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product a while ago and finally decided to get it during the sale, so I got a brand new lip gloss and the bottle is basically empty! save your money. Some drugstores glosses are just as good and at least you get a full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Probably won’t buy this product again, loved the consistency and color, just not my go to wasn’t much of a temporary plump and there is no stopper in it, product leaks out and grabs too much as yore trying to apply.
